alert.note: Alert for Norfolk; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:32AM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Neponset River At Norwood affecting Norfolk and Suffolk Counties. Taunton River Near Bridgewater affecting Bristol and Plymouth Counties. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Taunton River...including Bridgewater...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neponset River at Norwood. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs along the Neponset River in Norwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM EST Wednesday was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 8.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.2 feet on 06/07/1982. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
